title: Shadowrun 5E Datasteal Collection August 2016
description:
Connecting to JackPoint VPN...
...Identity Spoofed
...Encryption Keys Generated
...Connected to Onion Routers
>>>Login: XXXXXXXXXXXXXX
>>>Enter Passcode: XXXXXXXXXXXXXX
...Biometric Scan Confirmed
You're in. Use it well.


Hoi, chummer.

Rumor on the streets is KickAss Torrents is dead.  The streets are not kind omae.  I decided to re-compile all Shadowrun 5E PDF releases I managed to get my digital paws on, while surfing the Matrix, and decided to upload my KAT releases to this node.  See below for what's included in this datasteal.




Aetherology - metaplane information; compatible with 4E & 5E

Assassin's Primer - assassin information

Bloody Business - corporate campaign sourcebook

Boardroom Backstabs 3: Battle of Manhattan - adventure; compatible with 4E & 5E

Bullets & Bandages - combat medic options sourcebook; compatible with 4E & 5E

Chrome Flesh - augmentations sourcebook

Core Rulebook (2nd Printing) - main rulebook for 5E; includes published errata from 07 Feb 2014

Court of Shadows - alternative setting for 5E, focusing on magic and intrigue

Coyotes - border-crossing information

Data Trails - decker, technomancer, and Matrix sourcebook

(Denver Adventure 1) Serrated Edge - adventure sourcebook set in Denver

Digital Tools Box - contains the Beginner Box (for players) and Runner's Toolkit: Alphaware (for game masters)

Gear Cards Series 1 - quick reference of gear

Gun H(e)aven 3 - weapons book; compatible with 4E & 5E

Gun H(e)aven 3 Weapon Cards - quick reference of weapons from Gun H(e)aven 3

Hard Targets - deep shadows sourcebook

Howling Shadows - critter sourcebook

Lockdown - plot sourcebook with Boston setting information

Market Panic - Big Ten megacorporations sourcebook

Rigger 5.0 - drone, vehicle, and rigging sourcebook

Run & Gun - combat and equipment sourcebook; 5E version of 4E's Arsenal

Run Faster - character options book; 5E version of 4E's Runner's Companion

Seattle Sprawl Digital Box - Seattle metroplex sourcebooks (contains 9 PDFs)

Shadow Spells - Awakened character options sourcebook

Shadows in Focus: Cheyenne - sourcebook on the Sioux Nation's main sprawl

Shadows in Focus: City by Shadow: Butte - sourcebook on another location in the Sioux Nation

Shadows in Focus: City by Shadow: San Francisco - sourcebook on one of California Free State's metroplex

Shadows in Focus: Sioux Nation - sourcebook on the Sioux Nation

Shadows in Focus: Sioux Nation: Counting Coup - adventure set in the Sioux Nation

Shadows in Focus: Sioux Nation: Starving the Masses - adventure set in the Sioux Nation

Spell Cards Series 1 - quick reference of spells

Splintered State - an introductory adventure for 5E

Stolen Souls - deep shadows sourcebook

Street Grimoire - magic sourcebook; 5E version of 4E's Street Magic

Ten Terrorists - npc sourcebook




Missions (Seasons 5 & 6 and Convention Compilations):

Boundless Mercy - collection of Missions

Firing Line - contains four Missions; compatible with 4E & 5E

London Falling - collection of Missions; compatible with 4E & 5E

Killing Pawn - Prime Mission

Sprawl Wilds - collection of Missions; compatible with 4E & 5E

Missions 05A-01: Chasin' the Wind

Missions 05A-02: Critic's Choice

Missions 05A-03: Gone Long Gone

Missions 05-04: Liberation

Missions 05-05: While the City Sleeps

Missions 05-06: Take a Chance

Missions 06-01: Ten Fifty-Seven

Missions 06-02: Amber Waves of Grain

Missions 06-03: Ancient Rumblings

Missions 06-04: Tick Tock



Fiction (all contain EPUB and MOBI formats):

Borrowed Time by R.L. King

Crimson by Kevin R. Czarnecki

Dark Resonance by Phaedra Weldon

Deniable Assets by Mel Odom

DocWagon 19 by Jennifer Brozek - short story

Fire & Frost by Kai O'Connal

Hell on Water by Jason M. Hardy

Neat by Russell Zimmerman - short story

Nothing Personal by Olivier Gagnon - enhanced fiction; also includes a PDF

Sail Away, Sweet Sister by Patrick Goodman - enhanced fiction; also includes a PDF

Shaken No Job Too Small by Russell Zimmerman

The Vladivostok Gauntlet by Olivier Gagnon - enhanced fiction short story; also includes a PDF

Wolf & Buffalo by R.L. King - enhanced fiction; also includes a PDF

World of Shadows edited by John Helfers - Shadowrun anthology
